name: Pedoaracnoclaustrophobia
description:
This is a game made in 8 days for the Jamoween 3 game jam.

It is a first person horror game. 

It uses all the basic first person controls.

WASD and E to interact. Left mouse button to attack.

You find yourself kidnapped and held in the basement of a strangers house. You luckily find a way out of the room, but what terrors lay down the dark tunnel?

Credits:

Game Level Design, Environment, and Coding:

Dominic Schaefer aka CoboltGames

Main enemy models and prop art:

WhaitJeezus (twitch)

Sounds through CCL: from Freesounds.org
